title: Cashew Hummus with Yummi Nuts Cashew with Salt
ingredients: 1 ½ cups of cashew seeds soaked and then drained (cover with hot water and let stand for an hour)
1 head of roasted garlic (cut in half, drizzle with olive oil and bake at 400º F for 35 minutes)
Olive oil and paprika to serve
instructions: Step 1: Place all the ingredients in a processor and process until you get a homogeneous mixture
Step 2: Place in a serving bowl and drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with paprika
Step 3: Serve with toasted pita bread
